sources.title: Duel At Diablo (1966) James Garner Â· Sidney Poitier
sources.description: The battle of a cavalry unit against hostile Indians is intertwined with the fate of three men. A carefully staged, thrilling Western that touches on the issue of race.

metadata.Plot: Lieutenant McAllister is ordered to transport several ammunition wagons to another fort through Apache territory with only a small troop of rookie soldiers to guard them. Along for the ride is ex-scout Jess Remsberg who is trying to track down Ellen Grange, who, having recently been freed from Apache captivity, has mysteriously run off again to rejoin them. Remsberg frees Ellen again and leaves her with the embattled soldiers as he rides off to the fort, not only for help, but to find the man who killed and scalped his Indian wife.
metadata.Writer: Marvin H. Albert, Michael M. Grilikhes
metadata.Actors: James Garner, Sidney Poitier, Bibi Andersson
